item.title: What Is Clickthrough Rate Manipulation and How Does It Work?
item.dc:creator: ctradmin
item.description: Obfuscating clickthrough rate manipulation is a deceptive practice aimed at artificially inflating the number of clicks on a specific link or advertisement. This unethical tactic can have serious repercussions on digital marketing campaigns and can distort crucial data analytics. Understanding how clickthrough rate manipulation works is important for businesses to protect themselves from falling victim […]
item.content:encoded:
Obfuscating clickthrough rate manipulation is a deceptive practice aimed at artificially inflating the number of clicks on a specific link or advertisement. This unethical tactic can have serious repercussions on digital marketing campaigns and can distort crucial data analytics. Understanding how clickthrough rate manipulation works is important for businesses to protect themselves from falling…
